commit.message:
configure.in: Fix thinkos in previous check-in.

2006-07-03  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>

	* configure.in: Fix thinkos in previous check-in.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r115147

files.patch:

 2006-07-03  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>
 
-	* configure.in: Fix thinko in previous check-in.

 	* configure: Regenerate.
